## Das Paket `rvest`

```{r}
library(rvest)
ht <- read_html('https://www.google.co.in/search?q=guitar+repair+workshop')
links <- ht %>% html_nodes(xpath='//h3/a') %>% html_attr('href')
gsub('/url\\?q=','',sapply(strsplit(links[as.vector(grep('url',links))],split='&'),'[',1))
```
